Easy 7-day return policy. Items must be unworn with original tags. Free returns within India. International returns may incur shipping charges. Refunds processed within 5-7 business days of return receipt.

Our clothing follows standard international sizing. We recommend checking our detailed size guide before ordering. For between sizes, we recommend sizing up for a more comfortable fit. Size exchanges are free within India.
We offer free shipping on orders above ₹999 across India. Orders are processed within 24-48 hours and delivered within 3–7 business days. International delivery takes 7–14 days depending on location.
We accept UPI, credit/debit cards, net banking, wallets, and PayPal. All payments are encrypted and processed securely.
Track your order by entering your order ID and email on our Track Order page. You’ll also receive updates via SMS and email.
For any queries, reach us at support@asuta.com or call +91-9876543210 (Mon–Sat, 10am–6pm).
Find answers to common questions in our FAQ section, including returns, order status, sizing, and payments.
Asuta is a modern streetwear brand merging quality with comfort. Crafted for everyday confidence and self-expression.
By using our site, you agree to our Terms & Conditions. Please review them before placing an order.
We value your privacy. All customer data is securely stored and never shared with third parties without consent.
To keep your clothing in top shape, wash in cold water, avoid bleach, and hang dry. Do not iron on prints.
We offer free size exchanges within 7 days of delivery in India. International customers must cover return shipping.
Visit our flagship store at Linking Road, Mumbai. More outlets coming soon across major cities!
Subscribe to our newsletter for exclusive drops, discounts, and fashion tips straight to your inbox.
Follow us on Instagram (@asutaworld), Facebook, and Twitter to stay updated with latest styles and stories.
Transform your vision into reality with our professional web development services. We create stunning, responsive websites that drive results.
Mobile-first responsive design ensuring your website looks perfect on all devices - smartphones, tablets, and desktops.
Custom website development tailored to your needs. From simple landing pages to complex e-commerce platforms.
Complete e-commerce solutions with secure payment gateways, inventory management, and user-friendly shopping experience.
Built-in SEO optimization to improve your search engine rankings and drive organic traffic to your website.
Regular maintenance and support packages to keep your website secure, updated, and performing at its best.
Reliable cloud hosting solutions with 99.9% uptime guarantee, SSL security, and daily backups.
Website speed optimization for faster loading times and better user experience. CDN integration available.
Content Management System integration allowing you to easily update and manage your website content.
Professional UI/UX design focused on user experience, brand consistency, and conversion optimization.
Advanced security measures including SSL certificates, firewall protection, and regular security audits.
Integration of analytics tools to track website performance, user behavior, and conversion rates.
Expert consultation services for website strategy, digital presence, and online business growth.
Domain registration and management services with wide range of TLD options and renewal management.
Professional email hosting solutions with custom domain names and advanced spam protection.
Basic Package: Starting at $999 - Perfect for small businesses. Includes responsive design, basic SEO, and 1-year hosting.
Standard Package: Starting at $1999 - Ideal for growing businesses. Includes CMS, advanced SEO, and e-commerce capabilities.
Premium Package: Starting at $3999 - Complete solution for enterprises. Includes custom development, advanced security, and priority support.
30-day satisfaction guarantee on all our web development services. Free support for the first month after launch.
Built with modern technologies including React, Next.js, Node.js, and other cutting-edge frameworks for optimal performance.
Browse our portfolio of successful projects across various industries. See how we've helped businesses grow online.
Transparent development process: Planning, Design, Development, Testing, Deployment, and Maintenance phases.
24/7 technical support available for premium clients. Standard support hours: Monday to Friday, 9 AM to 6 PM.
Join our satisfied clients who have transformed their online presence. Read success stories and client testimonials.
Create your dream website without coding. Our intuitive drag-and-drop website builder makes it easy to build professional websites in minutes.
Choose from 500+ professionally designed templates across industries - Business, E-commerce, Portfolio, Blog, Restaurant, and more.
Drag and drop interface with 50+ customizable elements - text, images, videos, forms, maps, social media widgets, and custom code blocks.
Easily customize colors, fonts, layouts, and styles. No design experience needed. Real-time preview of all changes.
Dedicated mobile editor to perfect your site's mobile view. Switch between desktop, tablet, and mobile previews instantly.
100+ pre-designed section templates for headers, footers, testimonials, pricing tables, team sections, and contact forms.
Built-in image editor with filters, cropping, resizing, and effects. Free stock photo library with millions of images.
Advanced form builder with custom fields, conditional logic, file uploads, and integration with popular CRM systems.
Complete blogging platform with categories, tags, comments, and SEO tools. Schedule posts and manage multiple authors.
Centralized media library for images, videos, and documents. Automatic optimization for faster loading times.
Define global styles and brand colors. Changes apply site-wide instantly. Save and reuse custom style combinations.
Advanced HTML/CSS editor for custom code. Insert custom scripts and tracking codes. Full control over your site's code.
Create custom popups and modals. Set triggers based on time, scroll position, or exit intent. A/B testing capabilities.
Unlimited revision history. Restore previous versions of your site with one click. Auto-save feature prevents loss of work.
Export your complete website code. Transfer to any hosting provider. Full ownership of your website files.
Team collaboration tools with role-based access. Comment on specific elements. Share preview links with clients.
Step-by-step tutorials and video guides. Live chat support while building. Regular webinars for advanced features.
Free plan available. Premium plans from $12/month include custom domain, premium templates, and advanced features.
Templates for every need: Business, Online Store, Portfolio, Restaurant, Hotel, Fitness, Education, Wedding, and more.
App marketplace with 100+ integrations - marketing tools, analytics, social media, payment gateways, and automation tools.
Automatic daily backups of your website. One-click restore to any previous version. Download backup files anytime.
Create multilingual websites. Auto-translation feature. Language-specific SEO settings and content management.
Built-in conversion tools - CTAs, lead forms, appointment booking, newsletter signup, and social proof widgets.
